q = int(input())
for _ in range(q):
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()
    ans = -1
    if n == 1:
        ans = a[0]
    else:
        for i in range(n-1):
            if a[i] > a[i+1] - k:
                ans = a[i+1] - k
                break
        else:
            ans = a[0] + k
    print(ans)

# TLE

q = int(input())
for _ in range(q):
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    a = set(map(int, input().split()))
    ans = -1
    for i in range(k+1):
        if i in a:
            continue
        else:
            ans = i
            break
    print(ans)


# cook your dish here
def main():
    for _ in range(int(input())):
        n, k = map(int, input().split())
        arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
        arr.sort()
        flag = True
        for i in range(1, n):
            if abs(arr[i]-arr[i-1]) > k:
                flag = False
                break
        if flag:
            print(arr[n // 2])
        else:
            print(-1)
            
if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    for _ in range(int(input())):
        n,k = map(int,input().split())
        if n==0:
            print(0)
        else:    
            arr = list(map(int,input().split()))
            arr.sort()
            flag = True
            for i in range(1,n):
                if abs(arr[i]-arr[i-1])>k:
                    flag = False
                    break
            if flag:
                print(arr[n//2])
            else:
                print(-1)
            
if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

n = int(input())

a.sort()
a = a[::-1]
ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    if a[i] > i+1:
        ans = i+1
        break
else:
    ans = n
print(ans)

def main():
    for _ in range(int(input())):
        n,k = map(int,input().split())
        arr = list(map(int,input().split()))
        arr.sort()
        flag = True
        for i in range(1,n):
            if abs(arr[i]-arr[i-1])>k:
                flag = False
                break
        if flag:
            print(arr[n//2])
        else:
            print(-1)
if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main(): 
    for _ in range(int(input())): 
        n,k = map(int,input().split()) 
        arr = list(map(int,input().split())) 
        arr.sort() 
        flag = True 
        for i in range(1,n): 
            if abs(arr[i]-arr[i-1])>k: 
                flag = False 
                break 
        if flag: 
            print(arr[n//2]) 
        else: 
            print(-1)

q = int(input())
for _ in range(q):
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()
    ans = -1
    if n == 1:
        ans = a[0]
    else:
        for i in range(1, k+1):
            if a[0] + i <= a[-1] - i:
                ans = a[0] + i
                break
    print(ans)
